author: holiman
content: 2929 uses 100, a good value to start with imo

author: _shemnon
content: We are engineering constrained right now and that performance issue is not even on our radar at the moment

author: _shemnon
content: I'm also a bit concerned we are over-fitting gas costs to CPU performance.  Unless we get a fairly exhaustive search I'm concerned we will open ourselves up to more "broken meter" attacks.

author: holiman
content: 700 to 100 is a 7x reduction, which is already quite a leap. I think it's already on the low side, but on-hand experimentation will tell. I don't think lower is realistic at this time

author: shamatar
content: Iâ€™m still not giving up on trying to fix Blake, but 40 gas value was indeed from your test on Geth, so from implementation perspective it can be lower than 100. Zero value is unlikely, I think such a trick most likely can be implemented too
